dataExport.title: Data Export

admin.title: Data Exports
admin.notDownloadable: This export is not available for download.
admin.scheduleDescription: The export will be processed during the next scheduled run (typically at 4 AM).
admin.executeNowDescription: The export will be created immediately. This may take a while for users with large amounts of data.
admin.createSuccessScheduled: Data export for {{ login }} has been scheduled.
admin.createSuccessImmediate: Data export for {{ login }} has been created.
admin.createError: Failed to create data export for {{ login }}.
admin.cancelSuccess: Data export for {{ login }} has been cancelled.
admin.cancelError: Failed to cancel data export for {{ login }}.
admin.cancelConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this data export request?

dataExport.description: Here you can request a data export in accordance with Art. 15 GDPR Right of Access. Once the export has been created, you will receive an email. In the following seven days you can download the export. Afterward, it will be deleted.
dataExport.descriptionDownload: Here you can download your requested data export.
dataExport.requestForUserSuccess: Successfully requested data export for {{ login }}
dataExport.typeLoginToConfirm: Please enter your login to confirm the data export request
dataExport.typeUserLoginToConfirm: Please enter the login of the user to confirm the data export request
dataExport.confirmationQuestion: Do you really want to request a data export?
dataExport.requestForAnotherUser: Request data export for another user
dataExport.requestError: Failed to request data export. Please try again later.
dataExport.requestForUserError: Failed to request data export for {{ login }}. Please try again later.
dataExport.downloadError: Failed to download the data export. Please try again later.
dataExport.recentlyRequested: A data export has already been requested recently. Please try again later.
dataExport.notDownloadable: This data export can no longer be downloaded because it doesn't exist (anymore).
dataExport.mostRecentNotDownloadable: Your requested data export can not be downloaded because it either has already been deleted or has not yet been created.
dataExport.isBeingCreated: Your recently requested data export is currently being created.
dataExport.lastRequestDate: You requested your last data export on
dataExport.loginOrName: Login or name of the user
dataExport.searchQueryTooShort: Please enter at least {{ length }} characters.
